name: Super Cars (itch) (EragonUra)
description:
How to play the game "Cars".
Select a car, then click
the left mouse button to go.
To win, gain a speed of 50 km/h(to gain speed
collect medals). If you crash or lose
 speed (you lose speed when
 you run into balls with spikes) 
you will lose.To finish, press the q key.
When you win or lose, 
if you press the green button, 
you will play again, and 
if the red one, you will finish playing.
Enjoy!
